snippet: A semiprivate event at the MGM Grand hotel and casino gave invitees the opportunity to nibble food prepared by Wolfgang Puck and mingle among Morgans, Astons, Lamborghinis and Ferraris.
abstract: A semiprivate event at the MGM Grand hotel and casino gave invitees the opportunity to nibble food prepared by Wolfgang Puck and mingle among Morgans, Astons, Lamborghinis and Ferraris.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT -- For many gearheads, seeing rare, expensive cars is the whole point of attending an auto show. But with the likes of Aston Martin, Ferrari and Lamborghini again skipping official appearances at the Detroit auto show, organizers staged a special viewing Sunday night of 28 exotic automobiles at the MGM Grand Detroit on the eve of the show's press previews -- exclusively for sponsor invitees and 100 members of the public who paid $500 per ticket for the privilege.

headline.main: Away From Cobo Center, Automobiles for the Other Half
